description: [Mispadu](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1122) creates a link in the startup folder for persistence.(Citation: ESET Security Mispadu Facebook Ads 2019) [Mispadu](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1122) adds persistence via the registry key `HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run`.(Citation: Metabase Q Mispadu Trojan 2023)

external_references.description: ESET Security. (2019, November 19). Mispadu: Advertisement for a discounted Unhappy Meal. Retrieved March 13, 2024.
Garcia, F., Regalado, D. (2023, March 7). Inside Mispadu massive infection campaign in LATAM. Retrieved March 15, 2024.
